sentence.Network_en: The name Saber - Toothed Tiger is used often but is not very true in a way.

sentence.Network_en: Saber - Toothed tigers are not related to tigers at all, they are related to cats.
sentence.Network_cn: 剑齿虎 完全与老虎不相关, 它们是猫属.

sentence.Network_en: The footprints in the sands changed saber - toothed tiger's, washed away by tide in silence usually.
